org.openimaj.image.processing.morphology

Class Thin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.morphology.Thin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectedComponentProcessor, ImageProcessor<FImage>, Processor<FImage>

    public class Thin
extends Object
implements ConnectedComponentProcessor, ImageProcessor<FImage>
    Morphological thinning of connected components and (assumed binary) FImages.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
